title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4052.4 - Stewards may modify specifications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4052.4 - Stewards may modify specifications

State Regulations

The stewards of the meeting may, however, modify
sections 4052.2 through
4052.5
of this Article when, in
their opinion, the necessities of the course require it. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4052.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
